report.name: Traversys.SSL_Certificates
report.title: SSL Certificates
report.show: name, common_names, _issuer_organization_name, serial, valid_from, valid_to, self_signed, #Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name as "Devices(s)"

report.name: Traversys.SSL_SelfSigned
report.title: SSL Certificates - Self Signed
report.show: name, common_names, _issuer_organization_name, serial, valid_from, valid_to, #Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name as "Devices(s)"

report.name: Traversys.SSL_Valid
report.title: SSL Certificates - CA Signed
report.description: SSL Certificates signed by a Certificate Authority
report.where: type = "SSL Certificate Detail" and not self_signed
report.show: name, common_names, _issuer_organization_name, serial, valid_from, valid_to, #Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name as "Devices(s)"

report.name: Traversys.SSL.Lifecycle
report.title: SSL Certificate Lifecycle Status
report.with: parseTime(time(valid_from)) as from, parseTime(time(valid_to)) as to
report.show: name, common_names, valid_from, valid_to, ((@to < currentTime() and 'Expired') or (@to < (currentTime() + 182 * 864000000000) and 'Expires in less than 6 months') or (@to and 'Current') or 'No Data') as 'Lifecycle Status', #Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name as 'Device(s)'

report.name: Traversys.getCert.Orphans
report.title: Orphan SSL Certificates
report.description: SSL Certificates not linked to a Host
report.where: type = "SSL Certificate Detail" and nodecount(traverse Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:) = 0

report.name: Traversys.getCert.Warnings
report.title: SSL Certificate Warnings
report.show: name, single(#Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name) as 'Device Name', single(kind(#Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.#)) as 'Device Node', single(#Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.type) as 'Device Type', _issuer_organization_name as "Issuer Name", _subject_organization_name as "Subject Name", valid_from, valid_to, ports, least_strength, warnings

report.name: Traversys.getCert.PKBits
report.title: SSL Certificates - Weak Public Keys
report.description: SSL Certificates with a weak public key (less than 2048 bits)
report.where: type = "SSL Certificate Detail" and warnings and _public_key_bits and toNumber(_public_key_bits) < 2048
report.show: name, single(#Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name) as 'Device Name', single(kind(#Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.#)) as 'Device Node', single(#Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.type) as 'Device Type', _issuer_organization_name as "Issuer Name", _subject_organization_name as "Subject Name", valid_from, valid_to, ports, least_strength, warnings, _public_key_bits as "Public Key Bits"

report.name: Traversys.getCert.ListeningIPs
report.title: All Listening IP Addresses
report.description: All listening local IP addresses discovered

report.name: Traversys.getCert.DeviceNames
report.title: List of Unique Device Names
report.description: List of device names gathered from heuristics

report.name: Traversys.getCert.DNSNames
report.title: List of Load Balancer Domain Names
report.description: List of domain names from discovered load balancers

report.name: Traversys.getCert.WebAppAllPorts
report.title: All Software Listening Ports
report.description: Web and Application software instances with listening ports

report.name: Traversys.getCert.SSLPorts
report.title: SSL Certificate Ports
report.description: All ports discovered via SSL certificates

report.name: Traversys.getCert.siCommunicationSummary
report.title: SI Communication Summary
report.description: Process all discovered SIs with siCommunicationSummary

report.name: Traversys.getCert.BAIs
report.title: Potentially Impacted BAIs
report.description: Business Application Instances potentially impacted by an SSL Certificate
report.show: name, valid_from, valid_to, #Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:Host.#Host:HostedSoftware:AggregateSoftware:BusinessApplicationInstance.type as 'Business Application Instance'

chart-channel.name: Traversys.getCert.Lifecycle
chart-channel.title: SSL Certificate Lifecycle
chart-channel.with: parseTime(time(valid_from)) as from, parseTime(time(valid_to)) as to
chart-channel.split: (bin(@to - currentTime(), [0,29*864000000000,91*864000000000], ['Expired', 'Expires in less than 30 days','Expires in less than 3 months','Active']) OR 'No Data')
chart-channel.show: name, common_names, valid_from, valid_to, ((@to < currentTime() and 'Expired') or (@to < (currentTime() + 29 * 864000000000) and 'Expires in less than 30 days') or (@to < (currentTime() + 91 * 864000000000) and 'Expires in less than 3 months') or (@to and 'Active') or 'No Data') as 'Lifecycle Status', #Detail:Detail:ElementWithDetail:.name as 'Device(s)'

chart-channel.name: Traversys.getCert.Signed
chart-channel.title: SSL Certificate Signing Status
chart-channel.description: Shows status of self-signed versus CA signed
chart-channel.show: name, common_names, ((self_signed and "Self Signed") or "CA Signed") as "Signing Status"

chart-channel.name: Traversys.getCert.Issuers
chart-channel.title: SSL Certificate Signing Authorities
chart-channel.description: Signing authority of discovered SSL Certificates
chart-channel.show: name, common_names, ((self_signed and "Self Signed") or _issuer_organization_name) as "Signing Authority"
